descriptionHtml:
[i]"Well find her. Tell her I want apple cabbage stew, with some canis root tea"
[/i]
So you want to taste the legendary Canis Root Tea, huh?
If the answer is "Yes" then this mod is for you!
It adds 3 types of Canis Root Tea:
-Canis Root Tea (Restore 12 Health. Restore 16 Magicka per second for 120 seconds. Restore 2 Stamina.)
-Nord Canis Root Tea (Restore 16 Health. Restore 1 Stamina. Resist frost 13% for 720 seconds.)
-Healthy Canis Root Tea (Restore 17 Stamina. Restore 10 Stamina per second for 720 seconds.)
-Scaleskin Canis Root Tea (Can breathe underwater for 120 seconds. Restore 10 Health. Poison resistance 30%)
-Dwarven Canis Root Tea (Restore 19 Magicka per second for 120 seconds. Healing spells heal 5% more. Fortify Enchanting 25% for 120 seconds. Fortify Smithing 25% for 120 seconds.)
Â 
If you want you can tell me which Canis Root Teas you would love to see in the mod! (Just don't ask for teas that require any of the DLC's, ok?)

P.S: This is my first mod and sorry for my bad english, I'm Polish.

Changelog (I know you love them.)
Ver. 2.0:
-Two new tea types: Scaleskin, Dwarven
-Changed the look of tea and changed the cup you need for crafting (More common cup)
Ver. 1.0:
-Mod first released
author: danykli
